Author: rail
Name: AetherDraw
Punchline: A realtime multi-user whiteboard raid planner. Compatible with aetherdraw.me
Description: Whiteboard raid planner for encounters. Use /aetherdraw to open. Supports realtime multi-user, multi-platform collaboration. Also available at aetherdraw.me when plugins are down!!
Changelog:
v2.4.1.0:Added Community Plan Browser (Search & Load).
v2.4.0.0:Added Status Icon search, per-page undo, page re-ordering, and live property editing.
v2.3.1.0:Changed BG to image import, page sync fixes.
